constant.name: displayName
constant.value: OAuth 2.0 Token Service

constant.name: description
constant.value: Generate OAuth 2.0 access token

constant.name: palette
constant.value: OAuth 2.0

constant.name: resources
constant.value: #Tue Jul 21 15:38:25 CEST 2020 OAUTH_MONITORING_SETTINGS=Monitoring OAUTH_DISCARDED_SCOPES=Scopes discarded from original request OAUTHMETA_VALUE=Value OAUTH_SERVICE_MONITOR_WEBSERVICE_USAGE=Enable monitoring ACCESS_TOKEN_TYPE=Access Token Type OAUTH_APPAUTH_NOFILTER=Do not filter client authentication methods STORE_SCOPES_IN=Scopes approved for token are stored in attribute\: FILTER_DISPLAYNAME=OAuth 2.0 Token Service OAUTH_APPLICATION_VALIDATION=Request Validation OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_GENERATENEW=Generate new token on refresh flow OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_SLIDING=Slide existing token expiration on refresh flow OAUTH_REQUEST_TOKENTRANSFORMER_TITLE=Select a circuit to transform the access token OAUTH_TOKEN_ALLOWJSONPOST=Allow to use Json as input OAUTH_SERVICE_MONITOR_COMPOSITE_CONTEXT=Composite Context NO_SCOPES_REGISTERED=If no scopes are in the request then scopes registered for the application will be used. OAUTH_TOKEN_ADVANCED=Advanced settings OAUTHMETA_NAME=Name OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN_GENERATION=Access Token OAUTH_APPAUTH_FORCESECRET=Force client secret usage for non confidential credentials GENERATE_NEW_REFRESH=Generate Refresh Token OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN_LENGTH=Access Token Length OAUTH_REQUEST_EXTENDEDGRANTS=OAuth Extended Grants GET_SCOPES_USING_CIRCUIT=Get scopes by calling a policy OAUTH_TOKEN_ALLOWGET=Allow Token request using HTTP GET OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_PRESERVEREFRESH=Preserve existing token on refresh flow OAUTH_APPAUTH_CHECKQUERY=Ensure client secret is not provided using query string OAUTH_AUTHORIZATION_TITLE=Select a policy to retrieve Resource owner's consent OAUTH_REQUEST_TOKENTRANSFORMER_LABEL=Token Transformer Policy SCOPES_MATCH=If scopes are in the request then they must match DONT_GENERATE_REFRESH=Do not generate Refresh Token FILTER_CATEGORY=OAuth 2.0 OAUTH_REQUEST_AUTHZCIRCUIT_TITLE=Select a circuit to validate provided grant OAUTH_VERIFY_AUTHZ_CODE_TITLE=Select an Authorization Code store OAUTH_APPAUTH_ASSERTIONCIRCUIT_TITLE=Select policy to validate Client Assertion OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRES_IN=Refresh Token Expiry(in secs) OAUTH_ADDITIONAL_FIELDS_FOR_TOKEN=Store additional meta data with the access token which can subsequently be retrieved. OAUTH_APPAUTH_ALLOWPUBLIC_CLIENTCREDENTIALS=Allow public clients to use 'client_credentials' OAUTH_TRANSIENT_CONSENT=Allowed Scope set which are only valid for this particular request ACCESS_TOKEN_DETAILS=Access Token Details OAUTH_AUTHORIZATION_LABEL=Resource Owner Consent Retrieval OAUTH_APPAUTH_USETAG=Filter authentication methods from Application custom attributes OAUTH_SERVICE_MONITOR_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTE_NAME=Which attribute is used to identify the client? OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN_SKIPCONSENT=Allow scopes which has not been validated previously by resource owner OAUTH_REQUEST_AUTHZCIRCUIT_LABEL=OAuth Grant Authorization Policy OAUTH_APPAUTH_ENABLEFORM=Allow client ID and secret as form parameters OAUTH_VERIFY_AUTHZ_CODE_LABEL=Use this store to validate Authorization Codes\: OAUTH_APPAUTH_ASSERTIONCIRCUIT_LABEL=Client Assertion support Policy FILTER_DESCRIPTION=Generate OAuth 2.0 access token OAUTH_TOKEN_GRANTYPE_FILTER=Filter Grant Types according to application OAUTH_REQUEST_AUTHNCIRCUIT_TITLE=Select a circuit to authenticate provided grant SCOPES_REGISTERED=of the scopes registered for the application. OAUTH_REQUEST_DECODECIRCUIT_TITLE=Select a circuit to decode grant type USING_APPLICATION=Get scopes from a registered application OAUTHMETA_DELETE=Delete Access Token Parameter OAUTH_APPAUTH_HTTPCIRCUIT_TITLE=Select Policy to validate Client HTTP Authentication OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_LENGTH=Refresh Token Length OAUTH_SERVICE_MONITOR_PANEL=Monitoring Options OAUTH_CACHE_ACCESS_TOKEN=Access Token will be stored here\: REFRESH_TOKEN_DETAILS=Refresh Token Details ISSUE_TOKEN_GROUP=Generate Token Scopes FILTER_ICON=oauth2_img OAUTH_APPAUTH_ENABLEBASIC=Allow client ID and secret using HTTP Authentication OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_REQUIRESCOPE='offline_access' scope is required for refresh token generation and grant USING_POLICY=Get scopes by calling a policy OAUTH_REQUEST_AUTHNCIRCUIT_LABEL=OAuth Grant Authentication Policy OAUTH_REQUEST_DECODECIRCUIT_LABEL=OAuth Grants Decoder Policy OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN_OPENID=Enable 'openid' scope on token service (bad practice) OAUTH_APPAUTH_HTTPCIRCUIT_LABEL=Client HTTP Authentication Policy OAUTH_FIND_APP=Client application authentication OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRES_IN=Access Token Expiry(in secs)

constant.name: ui
constant.value:
<ui> <validator class="com.vordel.client.manager.filter.oauth2.provider.ScopeGenerationValidator"/> <panel columns="2"> <panel columns="2" fill="false"> <NameAttribute/> </panel>
<panel columns="2" span="2"> <tabFolder span="2"> <tab label="OAUTH_APPLICATION_VALIDATION"> <panel columns="2" fill="false" span="2"> <panel columns="1" fill="false" span="2"> <ButtonAttribute field="enableHttpGET" label="OAUTH_TOKEN_ALLOWGET"/> <ButtonAttribute field="enableJsonPOST" label="OAUTH_TOKEN_ALLOWJSONPOST"/> <ButtonAttribute field="enableGrantTypeFilter" label="OAUTH_TOKEN_GRANTYPE_FILTER"/> <ReferenceSelector field="authzCodeCache" selectableTypes="AuthzCodePersist" searches="OAuth2StoresGroup,AuthzCodeStoreGroup" label="OAUTH_VERIFY_AUTHZ_CODE_LABEL" title="OAUTH_VERIFY_AUTHZ_CODE_TITLE"/> </panel> <group span="2" label="OAUTH_FIND_APP" fill="false"> <RadioGroupAttribute field="enableClientAuthFilter" span="2"> <choice value="1" label="OAUTH_APPAUTH_USETAG"/> <choice value="0" label="OAUTH_APPAUTH_NOFILTER"/> <panel columns="2" fill="false"> <panel columns="1" fill="false" span="2"> <ButtonAttribute field="enableFormClientAuth" label="OAUTH_APPAUTH_ENABLEFORM"/> <ButtonAttribute field="enableBasicClientAuth" label="OAUTH_APPAUTH_ENABLEBASIC"/> </panel> </panel> </RadioGroupAttribute> <ButtonAttribute field="enableClientSecretQueryCheck" label="OAUTH_APPAUTH_CHECKQUERY"/> <ButtonAttribute field="forceClientSecret" label="OAUTH_APPAUTH_FORCESECRET"/> <panel columns="2"> <ReferenceSelector field="clientAssertionValidator" selectableTypes="FilterCircuit" searches="ROOT_CIRCUIT_CONTAINER,CircuitContainer" label="OAUTH_APPAUTH_ASSERTIONCIRCUIT_LABEL" title="OAUTH_APPAUTH_ASSERTIONCIRCUIT_TITLE"/> <ReferenceSelector field="clientAuthorizationValidator" selectableTypes="FilterCircuit" searches="ROOT_CIRCUIT_CONTAINER,CircuitContainer" label="OAUTH_APPAUTH_HTTPCIRCUIT_LABEL" title="OAUTH_APPAUTH_HTTPCIRCUIT_TITLE"/> </panel> </group> <panel> <ButtonAttribute field="skipUserConsent" label="OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN_SKIPCONSENT"/> <panel label="OAUTH_CONSENT_PANEL" columns="2" fill="false" span="2"> <ReferenceSelector field="authorizationPolicy" selectableTypes="FilterCircuit" searches="ROOT_CIRCUIT_CONTAINER,CircuitContainer" label="OAUTH_AUTHORIZATION_LABEL" title="OAUTH_AUTHORIZATION_TITLE"/> <TextAttribute field="transientAllowedScopes" label="OAUTH_TRANSIENT_CONSENT"/> <TextAttribute field="discardedScopes" label="OAUTH_DISCARDED_SCOPES"/> </panel> <binding driver="OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN_SKIPCONSENT" driven="OAUTH_CONSENT_PANEL" uncheckOverride="enabled" class="com.vordel.client.ui.declarative.Enabler"/> </panel> </panel> </tab>
<tab label="OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN_GENERATION"> <scrollpanel> <panel> <panel columns="3" fill="false"> <ReferenceSelector field="tokenStore" selectableTypes="AccessTokenPersist" searches="OAuth2StoresGroup,AccessTokenStoreGroup" label="OAUTH_CACHE_ACCESS_TOKEN" title="OAUTH_CACHE_ACCESS_TOKEN" required="true"/>
</panel>
<group label="ACCESS_TOKEN_DETAILS" fill="false"> <panel columns="6" margin="0,0,0,10" horizontalSpacing="12"> <TextAttribute field="accessTokenExpiresInSecs" label="OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRES_IN" required="true"/> <TextAttribute field="accessTokenlength" label="OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN_LENGTH" required="true"/> <TextAttribute field="accessTokenType" label="ACCESS_TOKEN_TYPE" required="true"/> </panel> </group> <group label="REFRESH_TOKEN_DETAILS" columns="6" fill="false"> <RadioGroupAttribute field="refreshChoice"> <choice value="NewRefresh" label="GENERATE_NEW_REFRESH" span="2"/> <panel span="6" columns="4"> <panel span="4" indent="25" columns="1" fill="false"> <RadioGroupAttribute field="preserveChoice"> <choice value="Preserve" label="OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_PRESERVEREFRESH"/> <choice value="Sliding" label="OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_SLIDING"/> <choice value="NewToken" label="OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_GENERATENEW"/> </RadioGroupAttribute> </panel> <panel span="4" indent="25" columns="4" margin="0,0,0,10" horizontalSpacing="12" fill="false"> <TextAttribute field="refreshTokenExpiresInSecs" label="OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRES_IN" required="true"/> <TextAttribute field="refreshTokenlength" label="OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_LENGTH" required="true"/> </panel> </panel>
<choice value="NoRefresh" label="DONT_GENERATE_REFRESH" span="2"/> </RadioGroupAttribute> </group> <group label="ISSUE_TOKEN_GROUP" fill="false"> <RadioGroupAttribute field="scopeChoice" columns="4"> <choice value="Application" label="USING_APPLICATION"/> <panel indent="30" columns="3" span="4" margin="1"> <ComboAttribute field="scopesMustMatch" label="SCOPES_MATCH" contentSource="com.vordel.client.manager.filter.oauth2.provider.ScopesMatch.VALUES" includeBlank="false" required="true" readOnly="true"/> <label label="SCOPES_REGISTERED"/> </panel>
<panel indent="30" columns="3" span="4" margin="1"> <label label="NO_SCOPES_REGISTERED"/> </panel>
<choice value="Circuit" label="USING_POLICY"/> <panel indent="30" columns="2" fill="false" span="2" margin="1"> <ReferenceSelector field="scopeCircuitPK" selectableTypes="FilterCircuit" searches="ROOT_CIRCUIT_CONTAINER,CircuitContainer" title="GET_SCOPES_USING_CIRCUIT"/> </panel>
<panel indent="30" columns="2" span="2" fill="true" margin="1"> <TextAttribute field="scopesForToken" label="STORE_SCOPES_IN" readOnly="false"/> </panel>
</RadioGroupAttribute> </group> </panel> </scrollpanel> </tab>
<tab label="OAUTH_TOKEN_ADVANCED"> <panel> <group label="OAUTH_ADDITIONAL_FIELDS_FOR_TOKEN" columns="2" span="2" fill="false"> <TablePage type="Property" tableHeight="150" dialogClass="com.vordel.client.manager.filter.oauth2.dlg.OAuth2TokenFieldsDialog" columnProperties="name,value" columnResources="OAUTHMETA_NAME,OAUTHMETA_VALUE" columnWidths="300,200" deleteText="OAUTHMETA_DELETE" dialog.setFlavor="oauth2tokenfields.xml"/> </group> <FieldTable field="extendedGrantNames" label="OAUTH_REQUEST_EXTENDEDGRANTS"/> <panel columns="2" span="1"> <ReferenceSelector field="grantDecoderCircuit" selectableTypes="FilterCircuit" searches="ROOT_CIRCUIT_CONTAINER,CircuitContainer" label="OAUTH_REQUEST_DECODECIRCUIT_LABEL" title="OAUTH_REQUEST_DECODECIRCUIT_TITLE"/> <ReferenceSelector field="grantAuthenticator" selectableTypes="FilterCircuit" searches="ROOT_CIRCUIT_CONTAINER,CircuitContainer" label="OAUTH_REQUEST_AUTHNCIRCUIT_LABEL" title="OAUTH_REQUEST_AUTHNCIRCUIT_TITLE"/> <ReferenceSelector field="grantValidator" selectableTypes="FilterCircuit" searches="ROOT_CIRCUIT_CONTAINER,CircuitContainer" label="OAUTH_REQUEST_AUTHZCIRCUIT_LABEL" title="OAUTH_REQUEST_AUTHZCIRCUIT_TITLE"/> <ReferenceSelector field="accessTokenTransformer" selectableTypes="FilterCircuit" searches="ROOT_CIRCUIT_CONTAINER,CircuitContainer" label="OAUTH_REQUEST_TOKENTRANSFORMER_LABEL" title="OAUTH_REQUEST_TOKENTRANSFORMER_TITLE"/> </panel> <ButtonAttribute field="allowOpenIDScope" label="OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN_OPENID"/> <ButtonAttribute field="refreshRequireOfflineAccess" label="OAUTH_REFRESH_TOKEN_REQUIRESCOPE"/> <ButtonAttribute field="allowPublicClientCredentials" label="OAUTH_APPAUTH_ALLOWPUBLIC_CLIENTCREDENTIALS"/> </panel> </tab>
<tab label="OAUTH_MONITORING_SETTINGS"> <panel> <group label="OAUTH_SERVICE_MONITOR_PANEL" columns="2" fill="false"> <BitMaskAttribute field="metricsMask"> <choice value="1" label="OAUTH_SERVICE_MONITOR_WEBSERVICE_USAGE"/> </BitMaskAttribute>
<TextAttribute field="clientAttributeName" label="OAUTH_SERVICE_MONITOR_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTE_NAME"/> <ButtonAttribute field="compositeContext" label="OAUTH_SERVICE_MONITOR_COMPOSITE_CONTEXT"/> </group> </panel> </tab> </tabFolder> </panel>
</panel> </ui>

constant.name: displayName
constant.value: Generate Json Web Signature

constant.name: description
constant.value: Generate a signed JWT or JWS object

constant.name: resources
constant.value: #Tue Jul 21 15:38:25 CEST 2020 SIGNATURE_ADVANCED_TAB=Advanced (JWS/JWT) CLAIM_OIDCH_LABEL=Authorization Code (generate 'c_hash' half hash) SIGNATURE_ALGORITHMFIXED=Manually specify algorithm OUTPUT_ATTRIBUTENAME_LABEL=Attribute name CLAIM_OIDATH_LABEL=Access Token (generate 'at_hash' half hash) SIGNATURE_OUTPUT_TAB=Signature Output FILTER_DISPLAYNAME=Generate Json Web Signature CLAIM_EXP_LABEL=Delay before expiration 'exp' (relative to 'nbf') SIGNATURE_JWSPAYLOAD_TAB=Signature Payload CLAIM_AUD_LABEL=Audience 'aud' SIGNATURE_KEYSELECTOR=Use Selector expression CLAIM_CRIT_LABEL=Critical extensions 'crit' CLAIM_JWK_LABEL=Embed all key related claims in the 'jwk' claim (except for 'jku') CLAIM_DEF_LABEL=Deflate body before signing (non standard) SIGNATURE_OUTATTRIBUTE=Set an attribute with the generated signature CLAIM_NBF_LABEL=Delay before usage 'nbf' (relative to system time) CLAIM_JKU_LABEL=JWK Set URL SIGNATURE_JWTTEMPLATE_LABEL=JSON Template SIGNATURE_ALGORITHM_GROUP=Algorithm selection SIGNATURE_CERTIFICATE_LABEL=Signer Certificate SIGNATURE_JWTCLAIMS_LABEL=JWT Claims SIGNATURE_PRIVATEKEY_LABEL=External Certificate Private Key CLAIMS_AUD_LABEL=Alternate JWT Audiences FILTER_CATEGORY=Integrity OUTPUT_HEADERS_BODY=Use body headers SIGNATURE_KEYCHAIN_LABEL=External Certificate Chain SIGNATURE_ALGORITHMLEVEL_LABEL=Discover algorithm level (256, 384 or 512) CLAIM_X5C_LABEL=Include 'x5c' certificate chain CLAIM_ISS_LABEL=Issuer 'iss' CLAIM_X5U_LABEL=Include 'x5u' certificate URL CLAIM_X5T_LABEL=Generate 'x5t' thumbprint CLAIM_KID_LABEL=Include 'kid' claim if a key ID is available SIGNATURE_ALGORITHMFIXED_LABEL=Algorithm QUICKFILTER_REQUIRED=http.headers,content.body SIGNATURE_JWSHEADER_TAB=Signature JOSE Header OUTPUT_HEADER_OVERWRITE=Overwrite existing value SIGNATURE_KEYID_X5T256=Compute Certificate x5t\#256 SIGNATURE_KEY_GROUP=Key Selection CLAIM_TYP_LABEL=Generate 'typ' claim SIGNATURE_OUTBODY=Set the generated signature as body SIGNATURE_OPENID_GROUP=OpenID Special claims SIGNATURE_JWSCERTIFICATE_GROUP=Certificate specific header claims SIGNATURE_ALGORITHM_TAB=Signature Key and Algorithm FILTER_DESCRIPTION=Generate a signed JWT or JWS object SIGNATURE_KEYSELECTOR_LABEL=Key SIGNATURE_OUTHEADER=Add the generated signature to an HTTP header CLAIM_X5T256_LABEL=Generate 'x5t\#256' thumbprint JWSEXTENSIONPOLICY_TITLE=Select a policy to extend the JWS Header OUTPUT_HEADERNAME_LABEL=Header name JWSPAYLOAD_LIFETIME_GROUP=JWS lifetime offsets (in seconds) SIGNATURE_KEYID_X5T=Compute Certificate x5t OUTPUT_HEADERS_MESSAGE=Use message headers JWTEXTENSIONPOLICY_TITLE=Select a policy to extend the JWT Payload FILTER_ICON=xmlsig SIGNATURE_KEYID_ALIAS=Use Certificate Alias SIGNATURE_JWT=Generate JWT CLAIM_SUB_LABEL=Subject 'sub' SIGNATURE_JWS=Generate JWS from existing body SIGNATURE_KEYID_LABEL=Signature KeyId Generation SIGNATURE_KEYSELECTORID_LABEL=Key ID JWSEXTENSIONPOLICY_LABEL=Extend JWS Header using a Policy CLAIM_JTI_LABEL=ID 'jti' JWTEXTENSIONPOLICY_LABEL=Extend JWT Payload using a Policy SIGNATURE_ALGORITHMLEVEL=Discover algorithm from key CLAIM_CTY_LABEL=Generate 'cty' claim (forced for nested JWT/JWS) SIGNATURE_KEYINSTORE=Use Key from internal key store CLAIM_IAT_LABEL=Include system time 'iat'

field.default: EEE, dd MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss zzz
field.name: timeStampFormat

field.default: Raising a Response Time SLA Alert. Alert details are as follows:- SLA Name: ${sla.name}. Requirement: At least ${sla.threshold}% of requests should have response times less than ${sla.upper} millis. Failing Percentage: ${sla.value}%. Failing Time: ${sla.time}.
field.name: breachAlertMessage

field.default: Clearing a Response Time SLA Alert. Alert details are as follows:- SLA Name: ${sla.name}. Requirement: At least ${sla.threshold}% of requests should have response times less than ${sla.upper} millis. Current Percentage: ${sla.value}%. Current Time: ${sla.time}.
field.name: clearAlertMessage

field.default: Raising a HTTP Status Code SLA Alert. Alert details are as follows:- SLA Name: ${sla.name}. Requirement: ${sla.threshold.type.str} ${sla.threshold}% of requests should have HTTP status codes in range [${sla.lower} - ${sla.upper}]. Current Percentage: ${sla.value}%. Current Time: ${sla.time}.
field.name: breachAlertMessage

field.default: Clearing a HTTP Status Code SLA Alert. Alert details are as follows:- SLA Name: ${sla.name}. Requirement: ${sla.threshold.type.str} ${sla.threshold}% of requests should have HTTP status codes in range [${sla.lower} - ${sla.upper}]. Current Percentage: ${sla.value}%. Clearance Time: ${sla.time}.
field.name: clearAlertMessage

field.default: Raising a Comms Failure SLA Alert. Alert details are as follows:- SLA Name: ${sla.name}. Requirement: No more than ${sla.threshold}% of requests may result in a comms failure. Percentage: ${sla.value}%. Time: ${sla.time}.
field.name: breachAlertMessage

field.default: Clearing a Comms Failure SLA Alert. Alert details are as follows:- SLA Name: ${sla.name}. Requirement: No more than ${sla.threshold}% of requests may result in a comms failure. Current Percentage: ${sla.value}%. Clearance Time: ${sla.time}.
field.name: clearAlertMessage

description
fval.value: Retrieves a message attribute and base64 encodes it

fval.name: script
fval.value:
from java.util import Base64 from java.lang import String from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets
def invoke(msg): data = msg.get("data") if data is not None: dataEncoded = Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(String(data).getBytes(StandardCharsets.UTF_8)) msg.put("data.base64", dataEncoded) return True

fval.value: Assigns the user an attribute called role with the value "Manager"

fval.name: script
fval.value:
from java.util import HashMap
def invoke(msg): userProperties = msg.get("attribute.lookup.list") if userProperties == None: userProperties = HashMap() msg.put("attribute.lookup.list", userProperties) userProperties.put("role", "Manager") return True

description
fval.value: Move the <enc:ReferenceList> to be before the <dsig:Signature>

fval.name: name
fval.value: Manipulate the Message Using the DOM API

fval.name: script
fval.value:
from org.w3c.dom import Element, Node, Document from com.vordel.mime import XMLBody
# This function moves the <enc:ReferenceList> to be before the <dsig:Signature> node. # This script is useful for WSE 3.0 (.NET) integration when a message that it signed, then # encrypted is required. When you run the signature generation filter, then the encryption # filter, the <enc:ReferenceList> will be placed after the <dsig:Signature>. WSE 3.0 requires # it to be placed before the <dsig:Signature>. # This function uses the DOM API to move the nodes in the message as required.
def invoke(msg): doc = XMLBody.getDocument(msg)
# Get the <soap:Header> node nodes = doc.getDocumentElement().getElementsByTagNameNS("http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/", "Header") if nodes.getLength() == 0: return False headEle = nodes.item(0)
# Get the <wsse:Security> node nodes = headEle.getElementsByTagNameNS("http://docs.oasis-open.org/wss/2004/01/oasis-200401-wss-wssecurity-secext-1.0.xsd", "Security") if nodes.getLength() == 0: return False wsseEle = nodes.item(0)
# Get the <dsig:Signature> node nodes = wsseEle.getElementsByTagNameNS("http://www.w3.org/2000/09/xmldsig#", "Signature") if nodes.getLength() == 0: return False signatureEle = nodes.item(0)
# Get the <enc:ReferenceList> node nodes = wsseEle.getElementsByTagNameNS("http://www.w3.org/2001/04/xmlenc#", "ReferenceList") if nodes.getLength() == 0: return False refListEle = nodes.item(0)
# Remove the <enc:ReferenceList> node from its current position removed = doc.removeChild(refListEle)
# Place the <enc:ReferenceList> node before the <dsig:Signature> node doc.insertBefore(removed, signatureEle ) return True

fval.name: script
description
fval.value: Retrieves a message attribute and base64 decodes it

fval.name: script
fval.value:
from java.util import Base64 from java.nio.charset import StandardCharsets from java.lang import String
def invoke(msg): base64EncodedData = msg.get("data.base64") if base64EncodedData is not None: dataDecoded = Base64.getDecoder().decode(base64EncodedData) dataString = String(dataDecoded, StandardCharsets.UTF_8) msg.put("data.decoded", dataString) return True

fval.name: script
script
description
fval.value: Passes if the current time is between 9am and 5pm and the day is a weekday (Mon-Fri)

fval.name: script
fval.value:
from com.vordel.trace import Trace from java.util import Calendar, GregorianCalendar
def invoke(msg): # 9 am - 5pm notBeforeMins = 9 * 60 notAfterMins = 17 * 60 # Monday - Friday notBeforeDay = Calendar.MONDAY notAfterDay = Calendar.FRIDAY
calNow = GregorianCalendar() hour = calNow.get(Calendar.HOUR_OF_DAY) minute = calNow.get(Calendar.MINUTE) minsNow = (hour * 60) + minute dayOfWeek = calNow.get(Calendar.DAY_OF_WEEK)
if (dayOfWeek < notBeforeDay or dayOfWeek > notAfterDay): Trace.debug("Tried to access the web service at the weekend") return False
if (minsNow < notBeforeMins): Trace.debug("Tried to access the web service before 9am"); return False
if (minsNow > notAfterMins): Trace.debug("Tried to access the web service after 5pm"); return False
return True
